@ClarkEv27594302 @Picklechu @NUL_Labour @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk Criticise all you like.  I work, live, and my children are educated within a mile of the landfill.  Four generations of my family live a stones throw away from the site.  I live with this stink every day, and have consistently opposed through every avenue at my disposal.

The @EnvAgency are about to consider application for waste reinjection at #Brockham. The oil co needs to reinject to increase reservoir pressure to restart #oil production from old wells. @JamesBevanEA says thinking needs to change faster than the climate. Can we see the proof? https://t.co/erVgrAMoXv

urls.title: Environment Agency drops pollution incident reporting
